title: Unable to sign in
body:
I can not sign in to the PBE server,But I'm sure I have received "Your alpha application was approved!"
When I login user name or password is wrong??

replies.body:
The PBE and the Alpha Client are **completely different systems. The PBE is where we test balance changes, new UI, or champions before they hit the live servers. The Alpha Client is simply the new client that will eventually replace the current client and you'll login using your live account. This changes nothing inside the game and simply lets you try the new client before it gets a full release later down the road.

Check out our [Alpha Client FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ) for more details. Let me know if you have any questions.
